# rect

**Instance Property**

The rectangle bounds of the region.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var rect: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion

This rectangle must be in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPointerInteraction] view’s coordinate space.

## Configuring a region

- **identifier**: An optional identifier for the region.
- **latchingAxes**: Axes along which the region latches after a primary click.
